title: kensaki_(splatoon)
body:
[b]Kensaki[/b] is an [[inkling_boy|inkling boy]] who was introduced in [[splatoon_2|Splatoon 2]].
He wears a pair of [[semi-rimless_eyewear|half-rimmed glasses]], gray button shirt with several red markings and dark-grey [[moccasins]] with orange soles. He has a short ponytail at the back of his head and his larger hair-tentacles have been swept to the side. His most frequently depicted team color is purple.

title: sainan_high_school_uniform
body:
The [[school uniform]] worn by the students of Sainan High School in [[To LOVE-Ru]].

* [[Summer Uniform]]
Male Uniform: a [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]] and [[green pants]] (plain pants in the anime, [[plaid pants]] in the manga).
Female Uniform: a [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]], [[green bowtie]], [[yellow sweater vest]], and [[plaid]] [[green skirt]].

* [[Winter Uniform]]
Male Uniform: a [[yellow jacket|yellow]] [[blazer]], [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]], [[green necktie]] and [[green pants]] (plain pants in the anime, [[plaid pants]] in the manga).
Female Uniform: a [[yellow jacket|yellow]] [[blazer]], [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]], [[green bowtie]] and [[plaid]] [[green skirt]].

h4. Examples
* !post #412156: Female winter uniform
* !post #3489710: Female summer uniform

title: cuttlefrsh_(splatoon)
body:
[b]Cuttlefrsh[/b] is an [[inkling_boy|inkling boy]] introduced in [[splatoon_2|Splatoon_2]] where he acts as the male player mascot for the game, alongside [[Surume_(splatoon)|Surume]], who acts as his female counterpart. 
h4. Appearance
He wears a pair of black headphones that wrap around the back of his head, black T-shirt, fingerless gloves (that are black and gray on the outside and yellow on the palms) as well as yellow mesh sneakers. His hairstyle consists of six short tentacles that have been combed backwards and are frequently seen in a green team color.

title: surume_(splatoon)
body:
[b]Surume[/b] (also known as [i]"Alice"[/i]) is an [[inkling_girl|inkling girl]] that was introduced in [[splatoon_2|Splatoon 2]] and serves as the female player mascot of the game alongside [[cuttlefrsh_(splatoon)|Cuttlefrsh]] who acts as her male counterpart. 
h4. Appearance
She has tan skin, wears a black and white flip cap, a large white tank top and thick teal sneakers. Her tentacle-hair is short, frames her face and is most frequently seen colored pink.

title: mori_calliope_(kawaiiope)
body:
The 10th [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[hololive English]]'s [[Mori Calliope]].

It consists of a buttoned [[white shirt]] with [[shoulder cutout]]s and [[puffy sleeves]], a [[pink skirt|pink]] or [[blue skirt|blue]] [[high-waist skirt]], a [[thigh strap]] on her left leg and [[black shoes|black]] [[high heels]]. She can also swap the shirt for a [[blue sweater]] from Underworld University, and has [[white-framed eyewear|white]] [[glasses]] and a [[Death-sensei (mori calliope)|]] [[stuffed toy|plushie]] as accessories.

She has 3 different [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]]s in this costume:

* Her [[mori calliope (1st costume)|default hairstyle]]
* [[Long hair|Long]] [[wavy hair]] with [[swept bangs]], [[hair flower|flowers]] and [[one side up]]
* And a [[short hair|short]] [[bob cut]]

h4. Appearance

* !post #8855607: Profile
* !post #8857225: L2D

title: pit_(splatoon)
body: [b]Pit[/b] is an [[inkling_boy|inkling boy]] who wears a paintball mask with a cap-like visor, [[grey_sweater|grey sweater]] along with blue, gray and orange [[sneakers]]. His hair and team color are frequently depicted as light blue.

title: laura_(splatoon)
body: [b]Laura[/b] is an [[inkling_girl|inkling girl]] with [[dark_skin|dark skin]], who wears a red [[baseball_cap|baseball cap]], a black short-sleeved [[shirt]] and white [[shoes]]. Her hair and team color are frequently depicted as pink.

title: rui_(splatoon)
body: [b]Rui[/b] is an [[inkling_boy|inkling boy]] who wears black and green [[glasses]] a baby blue [[long_sleeves|long-sleeved]] button-down shirt and blue [[slip-on_shoes |slip-on shoes]]. His hair and team color are frequently depicted in purple.

title: mizuho_(splatoon)
body: [b]Mizuho[/b] is an [[inkling_girl|inkling girl]] who wears a large [[bobblehat]], green [[hoodie]] and large brown [[boots]]. Her hair and team color are frequently depicted as green.

title: john_(splatoon)
body:
[b]John[/b] is an [[inkling_boy|inkling boy]] from the [[splatoon_(series)|Splatoon]] series and was introduced in [[splatoon_1|Splatoon 1]]. He acts as the male [[inkling_player_character|player]] mascot for the game, alongside [[kaori_(splatoon)|Kaori]] who is the female player mascot.
h5. Appearance
He usually wears a pair of [[goggles_on_head|goggles on his head]], a white [[short_sleeves|short-sleeved]] [[t-shirt]] with a black [[long_sleeves|long-sleeved]] shirt underneath, black [[bike_shorts|bike shorts]] and large purple [[sneakers]]. His [[tentacle_hair|hair tentacles]] are tied up in a [[topknot]] and is most frequently colored [[blue_hair|blue]], (though this may change depending on his team's color).

title: zaku_mariner
body:
Fictional manned giant combat robot from the [[Gundam]] [[mecha]]verse.

[b]RMS-192M Zaku Mariner[/b]

The [[Earth Federation]]'s production-line version of the Principality of [[Zeon]]'s MS-06M (MSM-01) [[Zaku Marine Type]] M-1 Prototype which was tested during [[mobile_suit_gundam|The One Year War]]. 

Ironically, the EFF was never able to use these suits as they were captured by the [[Neo Zeon]] forces during [[gundam_zz|The First Neo Zeon War]], when their forces invaded Earth in U.C. 0088. A team of Zaku Mariners were used on an attack on the [[Argama]] after the ship had descended to Earth.

In U.C. 0096, two Zaku Mariners were used by the Zeon Remnants during their [[gundam_unicorn|Attack on the Federation's Torrington Base]].

title: zaku_marine_type
body:
Fictional manned giant combat robot from the [[Gundam]] [[mecha]]verse.

[b]MS-06M Zaku Marine Type[/b]

An experimental submarine combat variant of the MS-06F [[Zaku II]], it was first featured in the original design series [[Gundam MSV]].

After [[mobile_suit_gundam|The One Year One]] the surviving units were repurposed and refined to be used by the [[Earth Federation]]. Dark Blue colored units were deployed by the [[titans_(gundam)|Titans]] as the [b]Marine [[Hizack]][/b].

h4.See also
* [[Zaku Mariner]]

title: titans_(gundam)
body:
[b]The Titans[/b] (ティターンズ [i]Titānzu[/i]) are the main antagonists of the [[Mobile Suit]] [[Zeta Gundam]] anime TV series. They are also featured in [[Gundam Sentinel]] and in [[Advance of Zeta]]: The Flag of Titans. 

They were an elite unit that the [[Earth Federation]] established in [[gundam_0083|U.C. 0083]] after the conclusion of [i]Operation Stardust[/i]. Their original intention was to defend the Earth Federation against supporters and military remnants of the Principality of [[Zeon]], as well as to investigate Zeon sympathizers. However, [spoilers]they employ brutal genocidal tactics against innocent spacenoid civilians from several colonies, what sparks the creation of [[military]] resistance groups like the [[space]] bound [[AEUG]] and the [[earth_(planet)|Earth]] bound Karaba, as the conflict escalates into a full-blown civil [[war]] known as "The Gryps War". The Titans' army eventually grew too big and turned rogue, allying themselves with [[neo_zeon|Axis Zeon]] in order to fight against the Anti-Earth Union Group in an attempt to gain control over the Earth Sphere. They were all but wiped out by the AEUG at the end of the Gryps Conflict, while some of its very few surviving MS pilots joined [[Neo Zeon]] or the [[Earth Federation]].[/spoilers]

h4. Notable members
* [[Jamitov Hymen]] - Supreme leader and creator
* [[Paptimus Scirocco]] - High officer, ace MS pilot and designer of several powerful advanced MS
* [[Bask Om]] - Infamous brutal spaceship captain

title: hizack
body:
A fictional [[mecha]] from the [[Gundam]] series. It first appeared in [[Zeta Gundam]] from 1985.

[b]RMS-106 Hizack[/b]

A [[mobile suit]] developed by the [[titans_(gundam)|Titans]] based on the legendary [[Zaku II]] series from [[Zeon]]. 

In order to snuff out the Zeon remnants, the Hizacks were made to greatly resemble the Zaku, but packed much more powerful beam weapons. Standard [[Earth Federation]] Hizacks are blue colored, while the Titans opted for the classic Zaku II green color scheme for their units. The Hizack replaced the [[GM Quel]] and was the standard Titans MS at the start of [[zeta_gundam|The Gryps War]], but was quickly replaced by the [[Marasai]].

After The Gryps War some grey colored units were seen deployed by the [[Neo Zeon]] [[full_frontal|Sleeves]] during their [[gundam_unicorn|Attack on Torrington]] base.

h4. Variants
* [[Hizack Custom]]
* [[EWAC Zack]]
* [[zaku_marine_type|Marine Hizack]]

title: aviator_cap
body:
A [[hat]] made of leather or similar material, worn by aviation [[pilot]]s and motorsport drivers to keep their head warm and to provide it some protection. Often made with ear flaps and worn with [[aviator goggles]]. Superseded by [[pilot helmet]]s when [[cockpit]]s became enclosed.

h4. See also

* [[aviator goggles]]
* [[ushanka]]

title: pilot_helmet
body:
A modern [[helmet]] worn by [[pilot]]s or military aircrew. It largely replaced the leather [[aviator cap]]s used by early pilots. Flight helmets provide impact protection. They often feature a visor, [[headset]] or [[microphone]] for both communication and noise attenuation, mounting system for [[night vision device]] and [[head-mounted display]], as well as compatibility with [[oxygen mask]]s.

h4. See also

* [[aviator goggles]]
* [[space helmet]]
* [[assault visor]]
* [[Tag Group:Headwear]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Flight helmet":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flight_helmet

title: kaori_(splatoon)
body:
[b]Kaori[/b] is an [[inkling_girl|inkling girl]] from the [[splatoon_(series)|Splatoon]] series and was introduced in [[splatoon_1|Splatoon 1]]. She acts as the female [[inkling_player_character|player]] mascot for the game, alongside [[john_(splatoon)|John]] who is the male player mascot.
h5. Appearance
She usually wears a pair of studio [[headphones]], a white [[t-shirt]], black [[bike_shorts|bike shorts]] and vibrant pink [[sneakers]] with light-blue [[shoelaces]]. Her [[tentacle_hair|tentacle hair]] is also stylized in a manner that frames her face and is most frequently colored [[orange_hair|orange]], though this may change depending on her team's color.
* !post #2083074

title: konjiki_no_yami
body:
Konjiki no Yami (金色の闇, lit. Golden Darkness), is a major character from [[To LOVE-Ru]] and [[To LOVE-Ru Darkness]]. She is portrayed as the deadliest assassin in the galaxy who is hired to kill protagonist [[Yuuki Rito]], but instead ends up falling in love with him. 

Her character design, including shapeshifting abilities and weaponized body, is based on [[Eve (Black Cat)|]] of the [[Black Cat (series)|]] manga, which was written and drawn by the artist of [i]To LOVE-Ru[/i], [[Yabuki Kentarou]].

h4. Appearance

title: akms
body:
The variant of [[AKM]] [[assault rifle]] with an [[MP40]]-styled under[[folding stock]]. The letter S on "AKMS" stands for складной ([i]Skladnoy[/i]), Russian word for "folding". This tag does not mean the plural form of AKM. 

Not to be confused with the [[AKS-74]], which has triangular side-folding stock.

h4. See also

* [[AKMSU]]
* [[Kalashnikov rifle]]
* [[List of Weapons]]

title: akm
body:
The [b]AKM[/b] (Russian: Автома́т Кала́шникова модернизи́рованный "[[kalashnikov rifle|Kalashnikov]]'s Automatic [[Rifle]] Modernized") is a [[Soviet]] 7.62×39mm [[assault rifle]], designed in 1950s as the major improvement from the earlier [[AK-47]]. Main features of the AKM are its stamped receiver (visible rivets) instead of heavier milled one, slanted muzzle brake, and straighter fixed buttstock profile.

Its design was copied and manufactured by various Soviet satellite states, such as Hungarian [[AMD-65]] and East German [[MPi-KM]].   

h4. Examples

* !post #7746396: AKM
* !post #5829268: [[AK-47]]. Lack of rivets and wide rectangular indentation. 
* !post #6264963: [[Type 56 assault rifle|Type 56]]. Milled or stamped receiver, but with folding spike bayonet and removable muzzle nut.

h4. See also

* [[AKMS]]
* [[RPK]]
* [[List of Weapons]]

title: ford
body:
A manufacturer of motor vehicles based in the United States of America. It was founded by [[Henry Ford]] on June 16, 1903.

Ford is the parent company of [[Lincoln (company)|]], and retains their trademarks for the now-defunct [[Mercury (company)|]] brand. They also previously owned several still-active foreign car brands, namely [[Volvo]], [[Mazda]], [[Aston Martin]], [[Jaguar (car)|]], and [[Land Rover]].

title: hippogriff
body:
The hippogriff or hippogryph is a legendary creature with the front half of an [[eagle]] and the hind half of a [[horse]].

It was invented at the beginning of the 16th century by Ludovico Ariosto in his Orlando Furioso. Within the poem, the hippogriff is a steed born of a mare and a griffin—something considered impossible. It is extremely fast and is presented as being able to fly around the world and to the Moon. It is ridden by magicians and the wandering knight Ruggiero, who, from the creature's back, frees the beautiful Angelica. Astolfo also borrows the hippogriff from Bradamante to go search for Roland's wits.

The hippogriff became a subject of visual art in the 19th century, when it was often drawn by Gustave Doré. 

For it's use in the Fate series, see [[Hippogriff_(Fate)|]].

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Hippogriff":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hippogriff

title: akigumo_(kancolle)
body:
[[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the Japanese destroyer [i]Akigumo[/i]. Character design by [[Fujikawa]], voiced by [[Taketatsu Ayana]]. 

She has [[long hair|long]] [[brown hair]] tied to a long [[ponytail]], [[green eyes]], and a [[mole_under_eye|mole under her right eye]]. Due to historical confusion on what class she was in, she wears the standard [i]Yuugumo[/i]-class uniform: a purple [[halterneck]] [[pleated dress]] over a [[white shirt]] with [[long sleeves]], [[blue bowtie]], and [[grey pantyhose]] with a pair of [[lace-up boots]]. 

Her [[rigging]] is a hybrid of the styles seen in the [i]Kagerou[/i]- and [i]Yuugumo[/i]-class: her bridge and foremast to her back with a 25 mm [[anti-aircraft gun]], a 12.7 cm twin [[handgun]] mount, and two 61 cm quad [[torpedo tubes]] on [[thigh strap]]s. 

Due to her lines (and the fact that her crew illustrated the sinking [[Hornet (kancolle)|]] in the battle of the Santa Cruz Islands), she is often portrayed as a manga artist and is sometimes shown "being involved in doujinshi":/pools/9514. 

The historical [i]Akigumo[/i] was initially grouped with the [i]Yuugumo[/i]-class by historians. This was due to her following the [i]-gumo[/i] naming scheme and because the [i]Kagerou[/i] and [i]Yuugumo[/i]-classes were quite similar in design. Researchers later found documents in 1994 indicating that she was actually meant to be the last of the [i]Kagerou[/i]-class.

title: ryuujou_(kancolle)
body:
[[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the Japanese light carrier [i]Ryuujou[/i]. Character designed by [[Kuuro Kuro]], voiced by [[Hidaka Rina]].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[brown hair]] tied into [[twintails]], [[brown eyes]], and a [[flat chest]]. Her default outfit consists of a maroon/dark red [[kariginu]]-like vest over a [[white shirt]], [[black skirt|black]] [[pleated skirt]], a [[magatama]] necklace, [[visor cap]] patterned off her real-life bow, [[thigh strap]]s holding [[anti-aircraft gun]]s, [[white socks]], and [[platform footwear]]. She emits blue flames with text reading "Imperial Edict" which is how she launches aircraft from her [[flight deck]] [[scroll]]. 

She talks in [[kansaiben|Kansai-ben]]. She is often nicknamed "RJ" and, with her cap, somewhat resembles a [[McDonald's]] worker. Near-constant victim of [[flat chest joke]]s in fanworks. Ironically, in game she is proud of her "distinctive silhouette" and never seems [[breast envy|envious]] of other girls' bosoms.

title: suzuya_(kancolle)
body:
[[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the Japanese heavy cruiser [i]Suzuya[/i]. Designed by [[Konishi (koconatu)]], voiced by [[Bridcutt Sarah Emi]].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[aqua hair]] with a [[hairclip]] and [[aqua eyes]]. She wears a brown [[school uniform]] with an orange [[ascot]], brown [[jacket]] and [[pleated skirt]], [[brown thighhighs]], and black [[loafers]] that have high heels. Her [[rigging]] includes multiple [[ship turret]]s with twin-[[cannon]] arrangements strapped two to her forearms, one on each thigh, and a larger one carried by a strap like a purse. She carries a mast like a backpack.

She has an energetic and informal personality, behaving like a typical high-school girl, with little sense of personal space and a frisky attitude. She's also frequently shown as being rather close to her sister-ship, [[Kumano (kancolle)|]].

title: kumano_(kancolle)
body:
[[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the Japanese heavy cruiser [i]Kumano[/i]. Character design by [[Konishi (koconatu)]], voiced by [[Bridcutt Sarah Emi]].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[brown hair]] in a [[ponytail]] and [[blue eyes]]. Like [[Suzuya (kancolle)|]], she wears a brown [[school uniform]] ([[brown shirt|brown]] [[collared shirt]], [[brown skirt]], [[brown thighhighs]]) and [[black footwear|black]] shoes.

Her [[rigging]] consists of all five 20.3 cm twin gun mounts plus two 12.7 cm twin [[anti-aircraft gun|dual-purpose mounts]] at base form but she discards the two left arm-mounted 20.3 cm mounts at kai form in favor of a [[flight deck]].

In stark contrast to her sister Suzuya, she speaks in a respectful and formal manner, evoking an ojou-sama type. However, she screams like a dolphin in battle. The scream itself (likened to a dolphin sound) is a meme.

title: low_tier_god
body:
[b]Dalauan Sparrow[/b] is an American [[Twitch.tv|Twitch]] streamer specialized in [[fighting game]]s.

He is notorious for his tendency to became tilted, ragequit, and use numerous obscene profanities whenever he is losing. His catchpahse "[[You should kill yourself NOW (meme)|]]!" later spawned a [[meme]].

title: amatsukaze_(kancolle)
body:
[[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the Japanese destroyer [i]Amatsukaze[/i]. Character design by [[Shizuma Yoshinori]], voiced by [[Ogura Yui]].

She has [[long_hair|long]] [[white hair|white]] or [[grey hair]] in a [[two side up]] hairstyle, decorated with windsocks acting as [[hair tubes]].

Her default outfit consists of a [[brown_dress|brown]] [[short_dress|short]] [[sailor dress]] with a [[white sailor collar]], [[grey neckerchief]] and [[lifebuoy]] clip, [[black hat|black]] [[mini hat]] styled after her real-life funnel, [[black choker]], [[single glove|single]] [[white gloves|white glove]] on her right hand, [[red thighhighs]] with [[garter straps]], and [[red footwear|red]] [[high heels]]. Her [[rigging]] consists of her own [[Rensouhou-kun]] on a bow hull piece to her right and quad 61 cm [[torpedo tubes]] to her back.

She is implied to be a [[tsundere]]. As the historical [i]Amatsukaze[/i] was the testbed for [[Shimakaze (kancolle)|]]'s turbines, she is, in a way, Shimakaze's elder sister.

title: takanami_(kancolle)
body:
[[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the Japanese destroyer [i]Takanami[/i]. Character design by [[Fujikawa]], voiced by [[Kuno Misaki]].

She has [[short_hair|short]] [[green hair]] in a [[bob cut]] with notable long [[sidelocks]], and [[brown eyes]]. She wears the standard [i]Yuugumo[/i]-class uniform: a purple [[halterneck]] [[pleated dress]] over a [[white shirt]], [[blue bowtie]], and [[grey pantyhose]] with a pair of [[lace-up boots]], with a [[yellow sports bra]] underneath her shirt. 

Her [[rigging]] is the same as the rest of the class: her funnel and foremast to her back with a 25 mm [[anti-aircraft gun]] mount, a 12.7 cm twin [[handgun]] mount, and two 61 cm quad [[torpedo tubes]] on [[thigh strap]]s. 

She has a personality that is lacking in confidence. Her verbal tic is "かも" or "kamo", which usually means "maybe". The homophone "kamo" (written "鴨") can also mean [[duck]], so she is sometimes seen with ducks for this reason. This verbal tic is shared with [[Akitsushima (Kancolle)|]], who was introduced at the same time.

title: hikari_(blue_archive)
body:
A student from and conductor of the Highlander Railway Academy in [[Blue Archive]]. Can be differentiated from her twin sister [[Nozomi (blue archive)|]] by her [[long hair|long]] [[wavy hair]] and [[pleated skirt]].

Her full name is Tachibana Hikari.

Her and her sister's names are based on the real-life "Hikari":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hikari_(train)] and "Nozomi":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nozomi_(train)] [[shinkansen]] operated by the [[Japan Railways]] group.

She and her sister are often referred to by the fandom as "shupogaki", a portmanteau of the Japanese onomatopoeia for the sound a train makes (choo choo) and gaki (brat).

She is often seen doing the [[rabbit pose]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #8304087: Profile

title: bagpipe_(arknights)
body:
[i]Bagpipe, former Victorian soldier, has come in search of the truth.[/i]

A playable Vanguard Operator in [[Arknights]].

Real Name: [spoilers]Fiona Young[/spoilers]

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Victoria[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]
      [td]July 17[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Race:[/td]
      [td]Vouivre[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]
      [td]167 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]5 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

A seasoned combatant from the 2nd Tempest Platoon of the Victorian Army who joined Rhodes Island upon [[ch'en_(arknights)|Ch'en's]] recommendation. Uses a piledriver spear as her preferred weapon. Well-versed with farming and operating agricultural machinery due to her countryside lifestyle.

Often compared to [[Nakano Nino]] from [[Go-Toubun no Hanayome]] due to her appearance.

One of the main characters of the story [i]Episode 9: Stormwatch[/i].

Her [[voice actor]]s are [[Toyosaki Aki]] (Japanese), Shen Yue (Chinese), Lauren Conroy (English) and Son Seon-young (Korean). Her art designer is [[U Jie]].

title: matoimaru_(arknights)
body:
[i]Matoimaru, Guard Operator of Rhodes Island, will wield her blade to wipe out the enemy.[/i]

A playable Guard Operator in [[Arknights]].

h4. Profile
[expand]

  [/tbody]

An excellent Oni warrior from Higashi. She exudes an incredibile bloodlust during combat, although she seems unaware fo this fact and forgets about these episodes. She fights with a [[naginata]].

She likes playing soccer and making flower arrengaments, which are described by others as very refined. She often organizes events around these subjects and drags other people in them, willing or not.

Her motif is likely based on the [[Ushi-oni]] yokai.

Her [[voice actor]]s are Ōtsu Airi (Japanese), Qiwen (Chinese), and Chae Min-ji (Korean). Her art designer is [[ryuuzaki ichi]].

title: ceras_yanagida_lilienfeld
body:
A character from [[Link! Like! Love Live!]]. A third-year in middle school who supported [[Katsuragi Izumi]] in the Love Live! tournament.

She has [[long hair|long]] [[grey hair]] with [[swept bangs]] and [[blue eyes]]. Her hair is decorated with [[pink ribbon|pink]] [[hair ribbon]]s behind each ear. Viewers have observed that she has a [[large breasts|pretty sizable bust]].

She wears the [[Mizukawa school uniform]] with a [[green necktie]].

[spoiler]She is actually [[Hinoshita Kaho]]'s childhood friend (due to their time together at the hospital). Kaho calls her "Secchan", while she herself calls Kaho "Hana-chan".[/spoiler]

She started appearing in With×MEETS streams since February 6, 2025.

Voiced by [[Miyake Miu]].

title: chocolate
body:
[b]Chocolate[/b] comprises a number of raw and processed foods that are produced from the seed of the tropical cacao tree.

Chocolate has become one of the most popular flavors in the world. It is a common ingredient in many [[snack]]s and [[dessert]]s, including but not limited to [[cookie]]s, [[cake]]s, [[ice cream]], [[pudding]], [[pie]]s and [[candy]]. [[Gift]]s of chocolate molded into different shapes have become traditional on certain holidays: chocolate bunnies and eggs are popular on [[Easter]], chocolate coins on Hanukkah, Santa Claus and other holiday symbols on [[Christmas]], and hearts on [[valentine|Valentine's Day]]. Chocolate is also used in cold and hot beverages, including chocolate milk and hot chocolate.

title: dino_buckler
body:
The transformation item for the [[Kyouryuu Sentai Zyuranger|Zyurangers]]. Made famous in the West as the [i]Power Morpher[/i] in [[Mighty Morphin Power Rangers]], with the item used as a telltale sign of a Ranger reference.

After transforming, the Dino Buckler remains visible on the uniform as the belt buckle.

title: shiroko_terror_(blue_archive)
body:
A character from [[Blue Archive]]. Similar in appearance to [[Shiroko (blue archive)|]]. Also goes by the name of "Anubis".

[spoiler]A version of Shiroko who remains the sole survivor of Abydos High School, exposed to Chroma by the Nameless Priests, which also altered her physical appearance. Shiroko would go on to serve the Nameless Priests directly under the protection of [[Phrenapates (blue archive)|]], until the main timeline's Sensei infiltrated the Ark of Atrahasis, leading to its subsequent destruction. In Volume 1 Chapter 3, Shiroko was summoned by [[Plana (blue archive)|]] to assist in subduing [[Hoshino Terror (blue archive)|Hoshino Terror]], whose mental state began to spiral similarly to hers.

As of the end of Volume 1 Chapter 3, Shiroko has now been appointed as a member of the General Student Council, and her Halo has slowly begun to heal, now that she's since let go of the guilt of losing her friends.[/spoiler]

She uses a [[SIG SG550]] [[assault rifle]] with a [[SIG P220/P226]] [[handgun]] as a sidearm. [spoiler]She additionally wielded the weapons of the deceased [[Foreclosure Task Force (blue archive)|Foreclosure Task Force]], but has since discarded them as a sign that she's begun to move on.[/spoiler]

Voiced by: [[Ogura Yui]]
Original artist: [[mx2j]]

h4. Appearance

* !post #8727368

title: mr._peabody_&_sherman
body:
A Jay Ward Productions property, originating out of [[Rocky & Bullwinkle]]. The original segment from the show, entitled "Peabody's Improbable History", features a genius dog named Mr. Peabody who adopts a human named Sherman. Every episode features the two of them using the Wayback Machine to go back in time to observe a historic figure. 

The segment would in the 2010s be spun-off into its own property, beginning first with the 2014 computer animated film by [[Dreamworks]], before being followed up by "The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show," which aired on Netflix from 2015 to 2017.

title: dante_(devil_may_cry)
body:
[b]The Legendary Devil Hunter, Dante[/b]

[b]Dante[/b] is the main protagonist in the [[Devil May Cry (series)|]] series. He is the son of [[Sparda]] and [[Eva (devil may cry)|]], the twin brother of [[Vergil (devil may cry)|]], and the paternal uncle of [[Nero (devil may cry)|]]. As such, he is a half-demon.

A demon hunter by trade, he owns the eponymous shop named after the series. Wielding his [[rebellion (sword)|sword "Rebellion"]] and twin pistols [[Ebony & Ivory]], he became a devil killer to avenge the death of his mother and protect humankind.

Unlike Vergil, he also displays a spunky, cocky attitude. Voiced by Reuben Langdon in North America, and Morikawa Toshiyuki in Japan.

title: mistletoe
body:
A [[plant]] with rounded leaves and white berries. It's often associated with [[Christmas]], where there is a tradition of [[kiss]]ing under branches of mistletoe.

Not to be confused with [[holly]], which is another plant with spiky leaves and red berries. While red-berried species of mistletoe do exist ([i]Viscum cruciatum[/i], [i]Viscum rotundifolium[/i]) they still lack spiky leaves.

h4. See also

* [[holding mistletoe]]

title: the_lazy_song_(bruno_mars)
body:
[b]The Lazy Song[/b] is a song by American singer-songwriter [[Bruno Mars]] from his debut studio album [i]Doo-Wops & Hooligans[/i] (2010). 

It is a lighthearted and humorous track that talks about taking a day off from work or responsibilities to just relax and do nothing. The song's lyrics are about Mars' desire to be lazy, stay in bed, and avoid any obligations, simply enjoying a day of leisure.

h4. External Links
* "Wikipedia: The Lazy Song":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Lazy_Song
* "Wikipedia: Doo-Wops & Hooligans":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doo-Wops_%26_Hooligans
* "Wikipedia: Bruno Mars":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bruno_Mars

h4. See Also
* [[that's_what_i_like_(bruno_mars)|That's What I Like - Bruno Mars]]

title: that's_what_i_like_(bruno_mars)
body:
[b]That's What I Like[/b] is a song by American singer-songwriter [[Bruno Mars]] from his third studio album [i]24K Magic[/i] (2016). 

It is a R&B and pop song that talks about the finer things in life that Mars enjoys and is willing to provide for a special someone. The lyrics highlight various luxuries and pleasures, including jewelry, trips, designer brands, and other extravagant experiences. 

It stands as the highest-charting single in the [[United States]] from the album. The song was the world's fourth-best-selling digital single of 2017, with 9.7 million units, ranking among the best-selling singles worldwide.

h4. External Links
* "Wikipedia: That's What I Like (Bruno Mars)":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/That%27s_What_I_Like_(Bruno_Mars_song)
* "Wikipedia: 24k Magic (album)":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/24K_Magic_(album)
* "Wikipedia: Bruno Mars":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bruno_Mars

h4. See Also
* [[the_lazy_song_(bruno_mars)|The Lazy Song - Bruno Mars]]

Typical features of demons include [[fangs]], [[demon horns|horns]], [[glowing eyes]], [[claws]], [[hooves]], [[demon wings|wings]], and [[demon tail|long tails]]. Demons are said to reside in [[Hell]].

This tag is for non-human demons. [b]Do not use for [[demon girl]]s and [[demon boy]]s.[/b]

title: sodashi_(racehorse)
body:
Real-Life Japanese Thoroughbred racehorse. Sired by [[Kurofune (racehorse)|]] and foaled by Buchiko. Sodashi is famous for being the first white horse in the world to be a winner of a G1 race at the 2020 Hanshin Juvenile Fillies. She was also winner of the 2021 Oka Sho and the 2022 Victoria Mile. She is one of the dominant fillies of the 2021 generation, along with [[Uberleben (racehorse)|]] (2021 Oaks) and [[Akaitorino Musume (racehorse)|]] (2021 Shuka Sho).

Sodashi has a white coat with a few spots of dark skin around her eyes. She ran either with a white or owner-colored hood ("Kaneko" colors: black with a yellow top third and a zig-zag pattern, with blue ears).

She retired on October 1st 2023 due to leg issues, passing the torch to her little sister [[Mama Cocha (racehorse)|]], who had recently won that year's Sprinter Stakes.
On January 30th 2025 (but with the news released 2 weeks later), she gave birth to her first child, a (presumed) dark bay filly with a peculiarly-shaped facial marking sired by [[Equinox (racehorse)|]].

h4. See Also
* [[Imanami Takatoshi]] - Groom
* [[Gold Ship (Racehorse)|]] - Senpai horse of the [[Sugai Naosuke|Sugai]] stable, with them sharing the same groom
* [[Mama Cocha (Racehorse)|]] - Non-White Full Younger Sister
* [[Meikei Yell (Racehorse)|]] - Contemporary and Non-White Cousin
* [[Hayayakko (Racehorse)|]] - Cousin also notable for his firsts (First white horse with graded wins on both turf and dirt)

title: mitm_(arknights)
body:
[i]Vanguard Mitm refuses to work overtime without pay.[/i]

A playable Vanguard operator in [[Arknights]].

Real Name: Pohl

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]

An intelligence officer and liason in Kazdel for Rhodes Island. He is one of the main characters in the Story collection [i]A Kazdelian Rescue[/i].

His codename is based on the [i]Man-in-the-middle[/i] cyberattack.

His [[voice actor]]s are Fumiyoshi Shioya (Japanese) and Wang Fuping (Chinese). His art designer is [[yuan quanquan ren]].

title: apple_vision_pro
body:
An [[augmented reality]] [[head-mounted display]] developed by [[Apple Inc.]] It was announced on June 5, 2023, at its 2023 Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) and became available for purchase on February 2, 2024 in the United States.

h4. External links

* "Official page":https://www.apple.com/apple-vision-pro/
* "Wikipedia: Apple Vision Pro":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apple_Vision_Pro

title: phantasy_star_nova
body: A 2014 video game for the PlayStation Vita developed by tri-Ace as the next installment of the [[Phantasy Star]] game series. It was released on November 27, 2014 in Japan, while a Chinese language version was released in March 2015.

title: elysia_(herrscher_of_human:_ego)_(honkai_impact)
body:
A playable [[official alternate costume|battlesuit]] of [[Honkai Impact 3rd]]'s [[elysia_(honkai_impact)|Elysia]], symbolizing her role as the Thirteenth Herrscher of the Previous Era. 

Her default Herrscher of Human: Ego battlesuit consists of an ornate [[sleeveless dress|sleeveless]] [[white dress]] with a black shorts-like bottom, [[white gloves]], [[white footwear|white]] [[knee boots]], and a white half-[[veil]] over the right side of her head. She is also seen with a [[halo]] of [[crystal]] shards. 

h4. Appearance

h4#intro. Intro

This is a list compiling named uniforms that are tagged on Danbooru. A uniform is defined as, "The distinctive clothing worn by members of the same organization or body, or by children attending certain schools." Therefore, different types of uniforms are compiled here, whether they be [[school uniform]]s, restaurant uniforms, [[military uniform]]s, sports uniforms, or otherwise outfits representing an organization or profession.

title: shikinami_(kancolle)
body: [[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the Japanese destroyer [i]Shikinami[/i]. Character design by [[Shibafu (glock23)|]], voiced by [[Touyama Nao]]. She has [[medium hair|medium-length]] [[brown hair]] tied in a [[ponytail]], and [[brown eyes]]. She and [[Ayanami (kancolle)|]] wear a [[brown sailor collar]] version of the Fubuki-class [[serafuku]], complete with a [[brown skirt]]. In real life, [i]Shikinami[/i] was part of DesDiv19 alongside her sister [[Ayanami (kancolle)|]] and her half-sisters [[Isonami (kancolle)|]] and [[Uranami (kancolle)|]]. She first saw action in the battle of the Sunda Strait where she fired the torpedo that sank [[Houston (Kancolle)|]]. Later seeing action in the [[battle of Midway]] and Naval Guadalcanal, she rescued [[Shirayuki (Kancolle)|]]'s survivors in the battle of the Bismarck Sea and spent the rest of her combat duty as a convoy escort, where she was sunk in one of these in September 1944. h4. Appearance * !post #3226378: Base * !post #3775600: [[Shikinami Kai Ni (kancolle)|Kai Ni]] * !post #2804886: [[shikinami (yukata) (kancolle)|Yukata]] * !post #8731590: [[shikinami_(maizuru)_(kancolle)|Maizuru]] h4. [i]Ayanami[/i]-class destroyers * [[Ayanami (Kancolle)|]] * [b]Shikinami[/b] * Asagiri (Yet to be implemented) * Yuugiri (Yet to be implemented) * [[Amagiri (Kancolle)|]] * [[Sagiri (Kancolle)|]] * [[Oboro (Kancolle)|]] * [[Akebono (Kancolle)|]] * [[Sazanami (Kancolle)|]] * [[Ushio (Kancolle)|]] h4. External links * "Kancolle Wiki: Shikinami":https://en.kancollewiki.net/Shikinami * "Wikipedia: Japanese destroyer [i]Shikinami[/i]":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_destroyer_Shikinami_(1929)]

title: teruzuki_(kancolle)
body:
[[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the Japanese destroyer [i]Teruzuki[/i]. Character design by [[Shizuma Yoshinori]], voiced by [[Komatsu Mikako]].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[light brown hair]] in [[twin braids]] with [[propeller_hair_ornament|propeller hair ornaments]] on the tips, and [[grey eyes]]. Her default outfit, the class uniform, is composed of a [[white shirt]] with a [[black sailor collar]], [[yellow neckerchief]], [[grey corset]] patterned off her real-life bow, two-tone [[white gloves|white]]-[[black gloves]], [[black skirt|black]] [[pleated skirt|pleated]] [[miniskirt]], [[white socks]], and knee-length [[rudder footwear]]. 

Her [[rigging]] consists of 61 cm quad [[torpedo tubes]] to her back, and two hull pieces with sentient 10 cm [[anti-aircraft gun|dual-purpose]] guns named [[Chou-10cm-hou-chan (Teruzuki's)|]] with [[ammunition belt]]s linked to her [[thigh strap]]s (both have a closed eye, one of them is biting a bullet as if it was a cigar).

Teruzuki has a very soft-spoken tone and nervous personality, and looks up to her sister-ship [[akizuki (kancolle)|Akizuki]]. When damaged, her worries about torpedoes and desire to jettison her own munitions stem from how detonation of her depth charges sank her in real life.

Her [[abyssal ship|abyssal]] form is assumed to be the [[Air Defense Princess]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #2454463: [[Teruzuki (yukata mode) (kancolle)|Yukata]] (unreleased)
* !post #2987849: [[Teruzuki (swimsuit) (kancolle)|Swimsuit]] (unreleased)

title: teruzuki_(swimsuit)_(kancolle)
body:
The [[bikini]] [[official alternate costume]] of [[Kantai Collection]]'s [[Teruzuki (kancolle)|]]. While considered an official costume, it has remained unreleased in the game apart from the 2018 calendar.

Her swimsuit consists of a [[white bikini]] worn with [[black shorts|black]] [[short shorts]].

title: mikuma_(2016_swimsuit)_(kancolle)
body:
The original [[bikini]] [[official alternate costume]] of [[Kantai Collection]]'s [[Mikuma (kancolle)|]].

It consists of a plain [[red bikini]] and matching red [[flippers]], with a [[bodyboard]] carrying her real-life seaplane deck pattern and her nickname "Kumarinko" printed on it. The outfit gained notoriety for its [[bad anatomy]] and was never repeated, instead opting to go for a [[Mikuma (2017 swimsuit) (kancolle)|new swimsuit design]] that's been used since 2017.

h4. Appearance

* !post #2440523

Her base/kai swimsuit consists of a [[multicolored bikini|tricolor bikini]] top and [[white bikini]] bottom worn beneath a [[white jacket]], and grey [[sandals]]. It matches with [[Mikuma (2017 swimsuit) (kancolle)|Mikuma's own]] swimsuit costume.

title: haruna_(2016_swimsuit)_(kancolle)
body:

She wears a [[white bikini]] under a [[white jacket]], [[red footwear|red]] [[sandals]] with [[strappy heels]], a single [[thigh strap]] containing an AA gun, and red [[bracelet]]s. Uniquely, her actual bikini was hidden from view until she was at least moderately damaged.

title: mikuma_kai_ni_(kancolle)
body:
The two second remodels of [[Kantai Collection]]'s [[Mikuma (kancolle)|]].

Her kai ni [[serafuku]] is colored to match her sister [[Mogami (Kancolle)|]]: a [[long sleeves|long-sleeved]] [[brown serafuku]] with a [[yellow sailor collar]] and a [[brown skirt|brown]] [[pleated skirt]], [[brown socks]], and [[grey footwear|grey]] [[boots]]. Her back funnel and mast-and-[[radar]] set are retained as well, plus her three 203 mm twin gun mounts (two on her legs and one handheld). Beyond this, her [[rigging]] takes two different forms depending on her specific kai ni.

In standard CAV kai ni, she retains her [[flight deck]]. In her alternate [i]Toku[/i] kai ni, she is reclassed as a transport cruiser/seaplane tender (AV) and her old flight deck is replaced with a new one that includes a large catapult, hangar, and a well deck for amphibious craft. 

h4. Appearance

* !post #7137317: CAV Kai Ni
* !post #7137326: Transport cruiser

title: son_goku
body:
The main protagonist of the [[Dragon Ball]] series. He is married to [[Chi-chi (dragon ball)|]] and has two sons named [[Son Gohan]] and [[Son Goten]].

Goku is a [[Saiyan]] born on planet Vegeta and raised on Earth. Capable of several different transformations including [[Kaiouken]], [[Super Saiyan]] [[Super Saiyan 1|1]], [[Super Saiyan 2|2]], [[Super Saiyan 3|3]], [[Super Saiyan 4|4]], [[Super Saiyan God]], [[Super Saiyan Blue]] and, ultimately, [[Ultra Instinct]].

His Saiyan name is "Kakarot", which is how [[Vegeta]] addresses him throughout the anime and manga. Some of his signature techniques are the [[Kamehameha (dragon ball)|]] and the [[Genki Dama]].

He is loosely based on [[Sun Wukong]] of the classical Chinese novel [i][[Journey to the West]][/i], whose name is translated as Son Goku in Japanese.

Goku's Japanese seiyuu is [[Nozawa Masako]], the current English dub voice actor is [[Sean Schemmel]] (though the character has gone through many different dub voice changes in the past), and his Latin American dub voice actor is Mario Castañeda.

In the early series, he possesses the [[ruyi jingu bang|Power Pole]] and the [[Flying Nimbus]].

h4. Appearance

title: bell-bottoms
body:
Legwear, most commonly [[jeans]], that widen at the bottom, typically starting at the knees. Also known as flares. When they widen from the ankles only, it may also be called a boot-cut.

They grew fashionable in the 1960s, and are associated with with a variety of [[fashion]] styles, including [[hippie]] and [[hip hop]] fashion.

body:

Named after [[Bright Noa]] from [[Gundam]], captain of both [[White Base]] and the [[Argama]], who was famous for delivering this kind of treatment to [[Amuro Ray]].

title: gundam_aerial_slap_(meme)
body:
Parody of a scene from [[Gundam Suisei no Majo]] involving the [[blood_on_hands|bloody hand]] of [[Gundam Aerial Rebuild]] [spoiler]after it crushed the terrorist's body into a bloody mess to save [[Miorine Rembran]], though this also traumatized her in the process[/spoiler].

Also known as "Fresh tomato flavor" (フレッシュトマト味) in Japan due to "a flavor":https://japanese-snacks-republic.com/product/product_page_15850.html of [[Aerial (food)|]] snack food that was collaborated with the anime [spoiler]and a scene earlier in the series showing [[Suletta Mercury]]'s hand covered in [[tomato]] juice during the festival, prophesied this scene[/spoiler].

h4. See also
* [[Bright slap]]
other_names: なんで...笑ってるの?人殺し!

title: eyebrows
body:
Most characters on danbooru have eyebrows. Use a better tag for unusual eyebrows instead, such as:

h4. Type of eyebrows

* !post #7427607: [[eyebrows hidden by hair]], eyebrows that are hidden behind bangs but are still visible.
* !post #7531006: [[hikimayu]], shaving off the eyebrows and painting new ones. Often in a distinctive comma shape or in a trapezoidal shape
* !post #3333779: [[raised eyebrows]], eyebrows are elevated from the usual resting position.
* !post #7355993: [[raised eyebrow]], for when one eyebrow is raised but the other is not.
* !post #5726330: [[raised inner eyebrows]], Eyebrows with only the inner ends raised. Often an expression of [[smug]]ness or [[fear]].
* !post #8034214: [[forked eyebrows]], for eyebrows that are split at the outer ends.
* !post #5636658: [[short eyebrows]], for unusually short eyebrows that only partially cover the brow ridges.
* !post #8002642: [[thick eyebrows]], for unusually thick cases.
* !post #8041159: [[huge eyebrows]], for when the eyebrow is thicker than thick.
* !post #7854327: [[furrowed brow]], when the skin around the eyebrows becomes creased.
* !post #1871573: [[v-shaped  eyebrows]], slanted inwards, forming a V shape.
* !post #5906879: [[curly eyebrows]], eyebrows that curl.
* !post #6305260: [[unibrow]], Eyebrows that are connected together.
* !post #5499154: [[eyebrow piercing]], a piercing though the eyebrow.
* !post #7092324: [[eyebrow cut]], a grooming style where one or more thin vertical stripes are shaved from one or both eyebrows.
* !post #7957120: [[mismatched eyebrows]], for when the eyebrows are a different color than the character's hair.
* !post #1750845: [[long eyebrows]], for unusually long eyebrows.

h6. Other
* [[no_eyebrows]]

title: nagae_iku
body:
The "Beautiful Scarlet Cloth". Sub-boss of [[Touhou]]'s [i][[Scarlet Weather Rhapsody]][/i] and playable character in that and [[Touhou Hisoutensoku]].

A celestial and messenger of the Dragon Palace who came to [[Gensokyo]] to warn its citizens of a massive earthquake, having the ability to read the atmosphere. She uses her [[hagoromo]] as a weapon (most notably as a [[drill]]), but is best remembered for her spellcard activation pose, which is similar to that used by [[John Travolta]] in the film [[Saturday Night Fever]] or [[Great Mazinger_(robot)|Great Mazinger's]] Thunder Break. Hinted to be a nanny figure to [[Hinanawi Tenshi]].

h4. External links

* "Touhou Wiki: Iku Nagae":http://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Iku_Nagae

title: zaku_ii
body:
A fictional [[mecha]] from the [[Gundam]] series. Notable because it has the distinction of being the [b]first robot[/b] featured during the begining of the entire franchise.

[b]MS-06 Zaku II[/b]

The main combat [[mobile suit]] of the Principality of [[Zeon]] during the One Year War. Originating from [[Mobile Suit Gundam]] as the [[Zaku II F/J]], there have been several variations of this mobile suit. Characterized by its domed head, [[shoulder_spikes|spiked shoulder]], [[one-eyed|one eye]]/head-mounted camera, and (typical) dark green color. 

This tag refers to specific group of mecha found in the gundam universe's One Year War setting and should not be used as a character tag.

h4. Variants of the Zaku II

* [[Zaku II F/J]]
** [[Zaku II F Dozle Zabi Custom]]
* [[Zaku II F2]]
* [[Zaku II FZ Kai]]
* [[Zaku II HMT Black Tri-Stars Custom]]
* [[Zaku II HMT Johnny Ridden Custom]]
* [[Zaku II S]]
** [[Zaku II S Char Custom]]
* [[Zaku Cannon]]
* [[Zaku Desert Type]]
* [[Zaku Mariner]]
* [[Zaku Marine Type]]
* [[Zaku Tank]]

h4. See also 

* [[Zaku I]]
* [[Act Zaku]]
* [[Zaku III]]
* [[Zaku IV]]
* [[Hizack]]
** [[Hizack Custom]]
* [[Geara Doga]]
* [[Geara Zulu]]
* [[List of Gundam mechas]]

title: v-shaped_eyebrows
body:
Eyebrows that are slanted inwards, forming a V shape. Often used to indicate a sense of mischievousness or [[smug|smugness]], or alternatively [[angry|anger]] or [[annoyed|annoyance]].

[[V-shaped eyebrows]] is usually used in combination with emoticon tags:

* >:3 is {{:3 v-shaped_eyebrows}}
* >:D is {{:D v-shaped_eyebrows}}
* >:o is {{:o v-shaped_eyebrows}}
* etc.

h4. Examples

* !post #454825
* !post #1602747
* !post #1871573
* !post #2664329

h4. See also

* [[>:)]]
* [[>:(]]
* [[furrowed brow]]
* [[Tag group:Face tags]]

title: raised_inner_eyebrows
body:
Eyebrows with only the inner ends raised. Often an expression of [[smug]]ness or [[fear]].

h4. Examples

* !post #1727858
* !post #5726330
* !post #3914603
* !post #6295088

h4. See also

* [[Tag group:Face tags]]

title: raised_eyebrows
body:
When a character's eyebrows are elevated from the usual resting position.

Use [[raised inner eyebrows]] instead when only the inner ends are raised, while the outer ends remain lowered.

Use [[v-shaped eyebrows]] instead when only the outer ends are raised, while the inner ends point downwards in a V shape.

h4. Examples

* !post #3333779
* !post #5913552
* !post #7925192
* !post #6150211

h4.  See also

* [[furrowed brow]]
* [[raised eyebrow]]
* [[Tag group:Face tags]]

title: list_of_flower_knight_girl_characters
body:
This is an alphabetical list of all tagged characters in [[DMM]]'s online browser game [[Flower Knight Girl]]. The player commands an army comprising of female [[personification|personifications]] of various [[flower|flowers]] and angiosperm plants to do battle against insects.

The Japanese names for flowers (and some genus names as well) are used on Danbooru rather than the English, when applicable. The English names are listed in each character's wiki, as well as Nutaku's official name for the character when applicable. Some characters will have a known official artist linked in their wiki as well. Characters with 10+ posts are highlighted in [i]italic[/i]. Characters with 50+ posts are highlighted in [b]bold[/b].

h4. Characters

title: shiver_(splatoon)
body:
[i][[Splatoon 3]][/i] character. Full name is [b]Shiver Hohojiro[/b]. Named [b]Fuuka[/b] in the Japanese version. Member of the band Deep Cut, and an [[octoling]].

In her default costume, she wears a [[chest sarashi]], a [[blue shawl]], a [[shimenawa]] [[hairband]] that is colored [[white hairband|white]], [[multiple earrings|multiple]] [[tooth earrings]] and [[black pants]]. She has [[red eyes|red]] [[cephalopod eyes]] and is often depicted with her [[blue hair|blue]] [[hair over one eye]]. Her default footwear includes [[black socks]] / [[tabi]] on top of [[platform footwear|platform]] [[okobo]].

In her boss battle in the story mode, she controls and rides a [[shark]].

h4. See Also
* [[Frye (Splatoon)|]]
* [[Big Man (Splatoon)|]]

title: suzuya_kai_ni_(kancolle)
body:
[[Suzuya (Kancolle)|]]'s Kai Ni form comes in two types: aviation heavy cruiser and light aircraft carrier.

On her second remodel, the uniform is replaced by a open brown [[cardigan]] with a lighter brown vest, and now the [[flight deck]] is the one having a strap, being carried like a shoulder bag. Her damaged portrait shows her wearing a [[purple bra]].

Her third remodel - a light carrier version - replaces her turret with a crossbow and her flight deck is much larger. This requires an additional blueprint since this is a hypothetical remodel based on the [[Ibuki (Azur Lane)|]]'s real-life conversion from CA to CVL (as Ibuki shared a largely identical hull to the Mogami-class.)

h4. Appearance

* !post #2681932: Second remodel
* !post #2681945: Third remodel
* !post #4311200: [[Suzuya Kai Ni (swimsuit) (kancolle)|Swimsuit]]

title: suzutsuki_(beachside_attendant!)_(azur_lane)
body:
The [[bikini]] [[official alternate costume]] of [i][[Azur Lane]][/i]'s [[Suzutsuki (azur lane)|]], as seen in post #4107049. 

Her swimsuit consists of a [[black bikini]] worn with a [[see-through shawl|see-through]] [[white shawl]], plus [[blue-tinted eyewear|blue-colored]] [[aviator sunglasses]] and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[sandals]].

title: makigumo_kai_ni_(kancolle)
body:
The second remodel/kai ni of [[Kantai Collection]]'s [[Makigumo (Kancolle)|]]. 

Her winter version consists of a grey [[blazer]] over the standard Yuugumo-class uniform which now has a sheer black underskirt and her pantyhose being reduced to [[thighhighs]] in the same seamed style. Her hairstyle gains a [[crown braid]]. Distinctly though, her blazer has absurdly long sleeves like in her base form which cover her hands upon damage. However, while undamaged, said sleeves are folded just high up enough to expose her hands.

She later gets the summer variant: a violet [[vest]] over a [[white shirt|white]] [[short_sleeves|short-sleeved]] blouse, a [[pleated skirt|pleated]] purple skirt with a sheer black underskirt, black gauntlet-like [[fingerless gloves]], and the abovementioned thighhighs. This however means that her hands are fully exposed in this uniform.

h4. Appearance

* !post #3319127: Winter
* !post #4645614: Summer
* !post #4037934: [[Makigumo Kai Ni (swimsuit) (kancolle)|Swimsuit]]

h4. See also

title: kazagumo_kai_ni_(kancolle)
body:
The second remodel of [[Kazagumo (Kancolle)|]] in [[Kantai Collection]].

The winter uniform consists of a short grey [[blazer]] over a [[dress]] with a sheer black underskirt. Her [[pantyhose]] has also been reduced to [[thighhighs]] in the same seamed style. Because she wears a [[necktie]] on her base form rather than a large bowtie like her sisters do, she accordingly switches to an [[ascot]] to match her remodel. On her damaged CG, one can still see a [[camisole]] undernath, implying she does not gain even a slightly larger bustline with the remodel, unlike even [[Makigumo Kai Ni (kancolle)|]], who now wears a bra on remodel.

The summer uniform consists of a grey and violet [[vest]] (its two tones being full view due to her keeping the ascot) over a [[white shirt|white]] [[short_sleeves|short-sleeved]] blouse, a [[pleated skirt|pleated]] purple skirt with a sheer black underskirt, black gauntlet-like [[fingerless gloves]], and the abovementioned thighhighs.

h4. Appearance

* !post #3410012: Winter
* !post #4645622: Summer

title: pola_(kancolle)
body:
[[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the Italian heavy cruiser [i]Pola[/i]. Character design by [[Jiji (Aardvark)|]], voiced by [[Akasaki Chinatsu]].

She has [[grey_hair|gray]] [[wavy hair]], grayish [[brown eyes]], and [[large breasts]]. Her default outfit consists of a black [[bodice]] over a [[white shirt]], [[red skirt|red]] [[miniskirt]] with [[anchor|anchors]] attached, [[red bowtie]], [[white hat|white]] [[mini hat]] patterned off her real-life fire-control director, [[white thighhighs]], and [[grey footwear|grey]] [[boots]].

Her [[rigging]] is just like her sister [[Zara (Kancolle)|]]'s: two hull pieces containing her four 203 mm twin gun mounts. 

She is often portrayed [[drunk]] or as a heavy [[wine]] drinker. This is in reference to her sinking, when her surviving crew were rescued intoxicated.

title: langley_(kancolle)
body:
[[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the USS [i]Langley[/i] (CVL-27).

She has [[medium hair|medium-length]] [[purple hair]] with [[hair ornament]]s that represent her real-life hull blisters, a blue [[hair ribbon]], [[blue eyes]], [[black gloves|black]] [[fingerless gloves]], [[sleeveless shirt|sleeveless]] [[white shirt]], [[pencil skirt]] with [[side slit]] and her hull number, [[garter straps]], and [[rudder footwear|rudder-propeller]] [[thighhighs]]. She also wields a [[Winchester Model 1897]] [[shotgun]].

She starts out as her original US Navy [i]Independence[/i]-class form, with her [[rigging]] consisting of her real-life flight deck split in two, a catapult, her two funnels at the back and her 76 mm AA single mounts. Her kai form add her hull number to her now combined flight deck and SK [[radar]] to her right, while her funnels are reduced to two and her 76 mm AA single mounts are replaced by two 40 mm quad AA mounts. Her rifle now also has a [[bayonet]] attached.

She was transferred to France in the post-war period as [i]La Fayette[/i], named in honor of the [[Marquis de La Fayette]].

Character design by [[Zeco]].

h4. Appearance

title: kaiboukan_no._22_(kancolle)
body:
[[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the Japanese escort ship [i]No. 22[/i]. Nicknamed as "Fuufu." Character designed by [[Hozuka (kadokawa)|]]. 

She has [[long hair|long]] [[black hair]] tied into [[low twintails]], and [[blue eyes]]. 

Her uniform consists of a [[white dress|white]] puffy [[sailor dress]] with a [[blue sailor collar]] and [[puffy short sleeves]], and grey-red [[loafers]] in her historical hull colors. Her [[rigging]] consists of her hull piece slung to her right, a 25 mm triple [[anti-aircraft gun]] mount on her left wrist, [[depth charge]]s on her legs, [[thigh pouch]] on her left leg, and a handheld 120 mm single gun mount.
